This problem arises due to ambiguity of different senses of words .The task of determining the correct interpretation of a word in its context is known as Word Sense Disambiguation ( WSD ) task .It employs a linguistic mechanism that detects the most suitable sense of a word , according to the context where the word is used , choosing of its possible senses .
